panels.description: 客户端发来的常见请求的 QPS。如果同一类请求在多个机器上分布显著不平均，那么需要考虑热点的问题
panels.title: QPS

alert.message: TiKV Storage ReadPool thread CPU usage is high
alert.name: TiKV Storage ReadPool CPU alert

alert.message: TiKV Coprocessor thread CPU usage is high
alert.name: TiKV Coprocessor CPU alert

panels.description: 非点查的 SQL 走 Coprocessor Pool
panels.title: Coprocessor CPU

alert.message: TiKV gRPC poll thread CPU usage is high
alert.name: TiKV gRPC poll CPU alert

panels.description: gRPC CPU 使用率，如果打满，需要调 TiKV 的 grpc-concurrency 参数
panels.title: gRPC poll CPU

panels.description: I/O util 反应磁盘的繁忙程度。接近 100% 意味着磁盘很忙，虽然未必达到了贷款瓶颈，但是延迟可能会受较大影响。
panels.title: IO utilization

alert.message: TiKV gRPC poll thread CPU usage is high
alert.name: TiKV gRPC poll CPU alert

alert.message: TiKV raft store thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV raft store CPU alert

panels.description: Raftstore 线程 CPU 使用率，这个线程池用来写 Raft log。
panels.title: Raft store CPU

alert.message: TiKV async apply thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV async apply CPU alert

panels.description: Apply 线程 CPU，这个线程池用来将写入应用到 kv engine 中。
panels.title: Async apply CPU

alert.message: TiKV Scheduler Worker thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV Scheduler Worker CPU alert

panels.description: Scheduler worker 线程池的 CPU 使用率。事务会在 Scheduler 中排队，这个线程池接近打满意味着 MVCC 的旧版本太多，事务处理过慢。
panels.title: Scheduler Worker CPU

panels.description: Append log 时间。过长意味着 Raftstore 线程太忙，有可能心跳处理不过来导致上面的 Leader 被切走。
panels.title: Append log duration

panels.description: Propose 如果在 Raftstore 中等得太久，则说明 Raftstore 线程很忙，或者被卡住了。
panels.title: Propose 99.9999% wait duration

panels.description: Raftstore 线程需要处理一些周期性任务。如果处理时间过长，则相当于 Raftstore 线程被卡住了。
panels.title: Raft event 99.9999% handle duration

panels.description: TiKV 的 Raftstore 会在处理不过来消息时发生 channel full，此时后续的消息会被丢弃掉，可能会导致 TiDB 重试或者掉 Leader。
panels.title: Channel full

panels.description: RocksDB write stall 说明写入请求被 compaction 或者其他流量控制措施卡住了。
panels.title: Raft RocksDB write stall duration

alert.message: TiKV gRPC poll thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV gRPC poll CPU alert

alert.message: TiKV Coprocessor thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV Coprocessor CPU alert

alert.message: TiKV Storage ReadPool thread CPU is high
alert.name: TiKV Storage ReadPool CPU alert

panels.description: 读请求执行前，都需要拿一个 snapshot
panels.title: Get snapshot duration

panels.description:
Disk seconds Read Latency.
- Critical:
  - Recommended performance value is < 10ms as avg value of the Avg Disk sec/Read,Write.
  - Critical value of the Avg Disk sec/Read,Write is > 50ms, should not exceed this value.
panels.title: Disk Read Latency (ms)

panels.description:
DISK seconds Read/ Write Latency.
- Critical:
  - Recommended performance value is < 10ms as avg value of the Avg Disk sec/Read,Write.
  - Critical value of the Avg Disk sec/Read,Write is > 50ms, should not exceed this value.
panels.title: Disk Write Latency (ms)
